reviewText: Best story on BBC1 and ITV; we view it through our local PBS and stream it from ROKU. So happy to own this as our family loves the show.

I enjoyed this supposed "stand alone" movie however as I own the entire series it is a start which as within that set and not a "stand alone." Had I realized that I merely duplicating what was already included in the complete series I would not have bought it. That said "Doc Martin" is always worth watching more than once!

Martin Clunes is fantastic as Doc Martin.  Although this particular series was aired as a movie, it fit in well with the story as a whole.  Absolutely funny series.  I loved it so much I bought the complete set only after watching season 1.

Martin Clunes returns for a one-off special filmed in 2006 between Series 2 and Series 3.  This 91-minute special finds Doc Martin and Luisa tied up and "On the Edge".

THIS IS A REGION 2 PAL DISK WHICH REQUIRES A REGION 2 OR REGION-FREE DVD PLAYER CAPABLE OF CONVERTING PAL SIGNAL TO NTSC.
